    • runCommand

      public static Process runCommand​(String command, File currentDirectory, Os os) throws IOException
      Run the command as a block, That is, it executes the entire command and then returns an object from the Process class that represents all outputs
      Parameters:
      command - The command
      currentDirectory - The directory you want to run the command in
      os - The operating system
      Returns:
      object from the Process class that represents all outputs
      Throws:
      IOException - If he can't execute the command because he doesn't have permissions

    • isPath

      public static boolean isPath​(String line)
      This function is used to check whether the text represents a path or not (needs to be modified)
      Parameters:
      line - The line you want to check
      Returns:
      True if the line represents a path, false if it is not a path

    • setDir

      Parameters:

      os - The operating system
